The Center for Advancing Safety of Machine Intelligence (CASMI) evaluates the human impacts of intelligent technologies and develops best practices for the design, development, and evaluation of systems to help ensure they are safe, equitable, and beneficial to all. https://t.co/BWtZeDvZqJ

Northwestern CS welcomes Xinyu Xing @xingxinyu, who joins us this week as an Associate Professor! Most recently, Xing was an Assistant Professor at Penn State. He completed his PhD at Georgia Tech. Xing's research interests include OS/AI security. https://t.co/hLF38XjcP5 https://t.co/ScUnFFOGDp
